head_office_address: Den Haag c/o Swan Lodewijk de Vromestraat 25
eu_initiatives: All issues related to intellectual property, more particularly trademark and design law.
organisation_name: BENELUXVERENIGING VOOR MERKEN- EN MODELLENRECHT/ASSOCIATION BENELUX POUR LE DROIT DES MARQUES ET MODELES. (BMM)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
EUIPO Anti-scam network 
EUIPO Users' Group 
European Sisters Association (network of European professional associations in intellectual property)
goals__remit:
The Benelux Association of Trademark and Design Law is a professional association of legal specialists. All the members work for patent and/or trademark agents, patent and trademark departments of large companies, as lawyers or as (university) lecturers. 
The association promotes and guarantees the quality of the professional practice of its members, ensuring expert advice and guidance on registration (protection) of trademark and (industrial) design, negotiations and possible conflicts.
relevant_communication:
Publication of BMM Bulletin (on intellectual property). 
 
Twice a year a conference on intellectual property is organized. In addition, BMM organizes on a regular basis presentations on important topics in the field of intellectual property in the Netherlands and Belgium. 
 
The BMM actively participates in surveys and events organized by EUIPO.
